scripts.dev:all: env FORCE_COLOR=1 concurrently -k --raw -n PHOENIX,AMMS,ARB -c "green,yellow,cyan" "bash -lc 'LOG_FILE="$PWD/data/logs/phoenix/runtime.jsonl"; EDGE_PHOENIX_JSONL="$LOG_FILE"; mkdir -p "$(dirname "$LOG_FILE")"; export LOG_FILE EDGE_PHOENIX_JSONL; pnpm -C packages/phoenix dev'" "bash -lc 'LOG_FILE="$PWD/data/logs/amms/runtime.jsonl"; EDGE_AMMS_JSONL="$LOG_FILE"; AMMS_DATA_DIR="$PWD/data/amms"; mkdir -p "$(dirname "$LOG_FILE")"; export LOG_FILE EDGE_AMMS_JSONL AMMS_DATA_DIR; pnpm -C packages/amms dev'" "bash -lc 'LOG_FILE="$PWD/data/logs/arb/runtime.jsonl"; EDGE_AMMS_JSONL="$PWD/data/logs/amms/runtime.jsonl"; EDGE_PHOENIX_JSONL="$PWD/data/logs/phoenix/runtime.jsonl"; DATA_DIR="$PWD/data/arb"; ARB_DATA_DIR="$PWD/data/arb"; mkdir -p "$(dirname "$LOG_FILE")"; export LOG_FILE EDGE_AMMS_JSONL EDGE_PHOENIX_JSONL DATA_DIR ARB_DATA_DIR; pnpm -C services/arb-mm dev'"
scripts.live: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.live -- bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; TS=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H%M%SZ); REPO_ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd); DATA_ROOT="$REPO_ROOT/data"; LOG_ROOT="$DATA_ROOT/logs"; ARB_ROOT="$DATA_ROOT/arb"; AMMS_DATA_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/amms"; PHX_DATA_DIR="$DATA_ROOT/phoenix"; ARB_LOG_ROOT="$LOG_ROOT/arb"; AMMS_LOG_ROOT="$LOG_ROOT/amms"; PHX_LOG_ROOT="$LOG_ROOT/phoenix"; EVENTS_LOG_ROOT="$ARB_LOG_ROOT/events"; mkdir -p "$ARB_ROOT"/features "$ARB_ROOT"/live "$ARB_ROOT"/ml "$ARB_ROOT"/params "$ARB_ROOT"/replay "$ARB_ROOT"/reports/live "$ARB_ROOT"/sessions "$AMMS_DATA_DIR" "$PHX_DATA_DIR" "$ARB_LOG_ROOT" "$AMMS_LOG_ROOT" "$PHX_LOG_ROOT" "$EVENTS_LOG_ROOT"; export DATA_DIR="$ARB_ROOT" ARB_DATA_DIR="$ARB_ROOT" ARB_REPORTS_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/reports" ARB_REPORTS_LIVE_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/reports/live" ARB_LIVE_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/live" ARB_FEATURES_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/features" ARB_PARAMS_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/params" ARB_REPLAY_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/replay" ARB_ML_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/ml" SESSION_LOGS_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/sessions"; export EDGE_AMMS_JSONL="$AMMS_LOG_ROOT/runtime.jsonl" EDGE_PHOENIX_JSONL="$PHX_LOG_ROOT/runtime.jsonl" AMMS_DATA_DIR="$AMMS_DATA_DIR"; export ML_EVENTS_FILE="$EVENTS_LOG_ROOT/arb-events-${TS}.jsonl"; RUNTIME_LOG="$ARB_LOG_ROOT/arb-runtime-${TS}.log"; ROOT_LOG="$DATA_ROOT/arb-live-full.log"; echo "[live] logging to $RUNTIME_LOG and $ROOT_LOG"; mkdir -p "$(dirname "$RUNTIME_LOG")"; touch "$ROOT_LOG"; SHADOW_TRADING=0 LIVE_TRADING=1; export FORCE_COLOR=1; RUN_CMD="pnpm dev:all"; if [ "${ENABLE_MARKET_PROVIDER:-0}" = "1" ]; then RUN_CMD="pnpm --filter @mev/arb-mm dev"; fi; stdbuf -oL -eL bash -lc "$RUN_CMD" 2>&1 | tee -a "$RUNTIME_LOG" | tee -a "$ROOT_LOG"; EXIT=$?; ln -sf "$RUNTIME_LOG" "$ARB_LOG_ROOT/latest-live.log" || true; pnpm report:live:live || true; pnpm -C services/arb-mm daily:if-needed || true; exit $EXIT'
scripts.live:jito: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env.live -- bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; TS=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H%M%SZ); REPO_ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd); DATA_ROOT="$REPO_ROOT/data"; ARB_ROOT="$DATA_ROOT/arb"; AMMS_ROOT="$DATA_ROOT/amms"; PHX_ROOT="$DATA_ROOT/phoenix"; mkdir -p "$ARB_ROOT"/features "$ARB_ROOT"/live "$ARB_ROOT"/ml "$ARB_ROOT"/params "$ARB_ROOT"/replay "$ARB_ROOT"/logs "$ARB_ROOT"/reports/live "$ARB_ROOT"/sessions "$AMMS_ROOT" "$PHX_ROOT"; export DATA_DIR="$ARB_ROOT" ARB_DATA_DIR="$ARB_ROOT" ARB_REPORTS_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/reports" ARB_REPORTS_LIVE_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/reports/live" ARB_LIVE_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/live" ARB_FEATURES_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/features" ARB_PARAMS_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/params" ARB_REPLAY_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/replay" ARB_ML_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/ml" SESSION_LOGS_DIR="$ARB_ROOT/sessions" EDGE_AMMS_JSONL="$AMMS_ROOT/runtime.jsonl" EDGE_PHOENIX_JSONL="$PHX_ROOT/runtime.jsonl" AMMS_DATA_DIR="$AMMS_ROOT"; export ML_EVENTS_FILE="$ARB_ROOT/live/arb-events-${TS}.jsonl"; RUNTIME_LOG="$ARB_ROOT/logs/arb-runtime-${TS}.log"; echo "[live:jito] logging to $RUNTIME_LOG"; SHADOW_TRADING=0 LIVE_TRADING=1 SUBMIT_MODE=jito stdbuf -oL -eL pnpm dev:all 2>&1 | tee -a "$RUNTIME_LOG"; EXIT=$?; pnpm report:live:live || true; pnpm -C services/arb-mm daily:if-needed || true; exit $EXIT'
scripts.start:all: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 concurrently -k --raw -n PHOENIX,AMMS,ARB -c auto "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/phoenix start || true'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C packages/amms start || true'" "bash -lc 'pnpm -C services/arb-mm start || true'"
scripts.start:phoenix: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm -C packages/phoenix start
scripts.start:amms: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm -C packages/amms start
scripts.start:arb: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- env FORCE_COLOR=1 pnpm -C services/arb-mm start
scripts.backtest:yday: node -e "const d=new Date();d.setUTCDate(d.getUTCDate()-1);d.setUTCHours(0,0,0,0);const f=d.toISOString();const t=new Date(d.getTime()+86400000).toISOString();console.log(f,t)" | xargs -n2 sh -c 'pnpm backtest -- --from "$1" --to "$2"' _
scripts.daily: pnpm backtest:yday && pnpm report:yday && pnpm optimize:yday
scripts.bootstrap: bash -lc 'set -e; corepack enable >/dev/null 2>/dev/null || true; corepack prepare pnpm@10.15.0 --activate'
scripts.rebuild:bigint: bash -lc 'set -e; export npm_config_build_from_source=1; MOD="node_modules/.pnpm/bigint-buffer@1.1.5/node_modules/bigint-buffer"; if ( [ -d "$MOD" ] ); then echo "[rebuild:bigint] Rebuilding bigint-buffer native addon"; cd "$MOD" && pnpm dlx node-gyp configure build; else echo "[rebuild:bigint] bigint-buffer not found; skipping"; fi'
scripts.postinstall: bash -lc 'set -e; export npm_config_build_from_source=1; MOD="node_modules/.pnpm/bigint-buffer@1.1.5/node_modules/bigint-buffer"; if ( [ -d "$MOD" ] ); then echo "[postinstall] Rebuilding bigint-buffer native addon"; cd "$MOD" && pnpm dlx node-gyp configure build; else echo "[postinstall] bigint-buffer not found; skipping"; fi'
